name: AbsoluteDodgeball
description:
AbsoluteDodgeball is a game created for 20 SECOND GAME JAM with retro style and 4 difficulty levels.

Your only goal is to survive 20 seconds in each difficulty.

Speaking about difficulty, there are four difficulty levels:

  • Normal (Pretty easy)
  • Hard (A little bit challenging)
  • Unfair (Unfair)
  • Adaptive

Adaptive increases its difficulty every time you successfully survive, it goes up to 15 and even further, but beware, after 15th only insanity lies ahead....

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D - Move
  • R - Restart current difficulty
  • Escape - Return to main menu

P.S. This is my first game, so I would love to hear out your opinions and thoughts, hope you will have fun  :D
